segments.text: It's kind of sad seeing the woman so unaware of the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink overflowing, water everywhere, and she's just drying that one plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle, soon the whole floor will be soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to mischief, reaching for cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that unstable stool, it could end so badly for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting eagerly, but this secrecy feels a bit heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so inviting and normal, a stark contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for the family if an accident happens because of this distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's open, tempting them into trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinets, damaging everything slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in her apron, trying to keep things tidy, but failing without realizing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The curtains tied back on the window let in light, but not awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR
